::Feline::
She got hit in the side of the neck and in the shoulder. She screamed 
out and growled. "AHHHHHHHH!" She glared at Blender,"YOU walking heap 
of scrap metal! I'll make sure your recycled into an exhaust stem!"  
She ran and leaped at Blenders face, clawing and biting. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Blender raised his saw. The optic beams burnt the saw. He fired his 
shoulder
> mounted gattling gun and tried to get close to Feline again...
